description: Have a special moment you want to preserve, a special place you want to have in your home, a family member or furry friend you want a painting done of? I would love to work with you on a peice of art that would mean a lot to you or to a special peson in our life. I not only do paintings, digital art and murals, I also do landscape design as I am a fully qualified landscape horticulturalist.

title: Sunshine
description: Here is how a peice of origional line art becomes a painting.
